attributes.additional_details:
Of all the alcohol related trouble on our streets, a significant percentage is related to those who have consumed Caffeinated alcoholic beverages, such as energy drink based cocktails and or alcho-pops. Such drinks enable the reckless drinker to carry on drinking far longer than they would otherwise, and significantly alter the mental state and personality of the consumer.

I would like the government to legislate to prevent the combined sales of high caffeine products and alcohol.
